title: Taiho Shichau zo: Nagisa no Koutsuu Yuudou

alternative_titles.en: You're Under Arrest: Diverting Traffic at the Beach
alternative_titles.ja: 逮捕しちゃうぞ 渚の交通誘導

synopsis: Summer arrives to Bokuto Station. Miyuki and Natsumi have to work on a beach road protecting the safety of the civilians that are enjoying their summer vacations. Suffering because of the heat, the two officers were having problems remaining calm, but then, some pickpocket appeared on the beach causing a ruckus. The girls will do their best to catch the thief, control the traffic and enjoy their summer day.
